metadata.source: Diocese of Springfield, MA - Online Directory
notes: PDF hyperlinks shifted by one entry - display text used as URL source
All services source=pdf, validated=false pending web validation
Confession "by appointment" entries have day=null, time=null
special_events array added per parish for non-liturgical recurring or one-time events
special_events categories: fellowship | conference | volunteering | liturgical | educational | outreach | social
special_events schema: { id, title, category, day, time, frequency (one_time|weekly|monthly|annual), notes, seasonal: { is_seasonal, season } }
times_vary: true flag on service entries means time is not fixed — app should display 'Check bulletin for times'
visitation object (optional, parish-level): { open_daily (bool), hours_note (string), source } — indicates church open for private prayer/drop-in visits
service type 'anointing_of_sick' added for Sacrament of the Sick/Anointing services
service type 'benediction' used for standalone Benediction at end of adoration blocks

validation.status enum: verified | low_confidence | needs_verification | unverified — low_confidence means data exists but source is stale/unreliable; app should display a warning badge and recommended_action

discrepancies: 3-church parish: Notre Dame, St. Stanislaus Kostka, St. Mary's Church/Chapel (same grounds). Divine Mercy is Friday-only at St. Stanislaus.
